content.rendered:
Directed by Ram Gopal Varma.

Written by R.D. Tailang.

Cast Sachiin Joshi(Operation Cocoon officer). Sandeep Bharadwaj(Veerappan). Usha Jadhav(Muthulakshmi). Nissar Khan(Police Chief Kumar). Uday Atroliya(Forest Inspector) . Chetanya Adib(Shashi). Mukesh Agrohari(Naxalite). Raj Singh Arora(Gopal). Akash Chawariya(Bhola). Zareen Khan(Dancer (as Zarine Khan)). Kamal D. Khatak(Veerappan’s gang member). Nalneesh(Betray). Nalneesh Neel(Betray). Jasmin Oza(Choreogpher (credit only)). Navin Prabhakar(Rajan). Lisa Ray(Shreya). Sunit Razdan(Bhupi). Kumar Saurabh(Ganga man). Shaneel Sinha(Gandhi). Amrendra Srivastava(Veerapppan gang man)

Language Hindi.

Producers Sahni Bob. Raina Sachiin Joshi. Pradip Khairwar. Satish Salvi. M.R. Shahjahan.

Production Viiking Media & Entertainment.
